"Bat-probes" said blacknighmare usin her comlink to the bat probes 
tha was ouside "help this bot (Downloaded picture of Drilbit) to 
trace the snake"

"She couldn't scape she said to Darkmouse"
--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> He was still in the room, and heard all of this. The wound was a 
bite,
> and there was venom involved. Very snake like. He went to a comp 
panel
> and checked the shipd vid log.
> "It was Diamond! The ship recorded it!"
> He turned back to StarScream.
> "Come on, lets get out of here."
> He walked down the hall for the exit.
